explanation: [0-0] A young woman and a young man stand in front of a purple background. The woman is wearing a white long-sleeve shirt and blue jeans, while the man is dressed in a blue denim jacket and blue jeans. Between them is a row of green gun and finger emoji patterns, with a red crossed-out speaker icon in the top left and right corners of the screen.
